name: Paranoia 2: Savior
summary:
The sequel to PARANOIA, Three Weeks have passed since the defeat of the sabotage group. The major wakes up in a hospital as the hospital is abandoned.

Coming back to three weeks ago, two hours after the terrorists were dealt with, the Spetsnaz are told of the creatures coming from KROT-1 and are spreading in the lower labs. Troops are then ordered to do a clean-up and kill as many creatures as they can. After restocking on ammo, the major and his team enter the labs from service elevators.

The Spetsnaz eventually reach KROT-1 where command orders to have the labs destroyed. Unfortunately, the infection of the virus caused civilians to turn into zombies and after a couple hours Russia was collapsed by the outbreak.
